title: PM condemns Karachi journalistâ€™s murder; orders taking culprits to task
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 18 (APP): Prime Minister Imran Khan Friday strongly condemned the brutal murder of journalist Athar Mateen in Karachi.
Expressing his condolence, the prime minister said he stood by the grieved family in that hour of grief.
He also directed the authorities concerned to make all-out efforts to take the culprits to task.
